title: I bought the championship Jewels forged them but it stayed with the same amount
body: I went into the store after a few days of the championship jewel not being there saw it bought it forged it in the screen is said 2 and I had eight but it stayed at eight.

replies.body: I tried again but it says that it can only be bought once a day

I checked your account and it looks like the action simply didn't happen properly. Can you try again after restarting your PC? 

Let me know if this happens again.
